#include <stdio.h>
 
int main() {
	long long int t, i;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--) {
		long long n, k, j, p=0, q=9;
		scanf("%lld %lld", &n, &k);
		long long crap=0, fans=0, ans=0, rem=0;
		for(j=1; j<=15; j++) {
			p=p+q*j;
			if(k<p) {
				p-=q*j;
				fans=fans+(k-p)/j;
				rem=(k-p)%j;
				if(rem==0)
					ans=fans%10;
				else {
					ans=fans+1;
					int l;
					for (l=0;l<j-rem; l++) {
						ans=ans/10;
					}
					ans=ans%10;
				}
				break;
			}
			fans=fans*10+9;
			ans=ans*10;
			q=q*10;
		}
		printf("%lld\n", ans);
	}
}
